notes.text:
Use a mix of sweet and tart apples
Chill pastry before rolling for easier handling
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream

on_enter.say: Right, let's preheat the oven to two hundred degrees celsius, which is about four hundred degrees fahrenheit. This will ensure our pie bakes evenly.

steps.descr: Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch, and lemon juice

on_enter.say: Now, let's mix those lovely apples with sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch, and a splash of lemon juice. Give it a good stir until everything is well coated and smells delicious!

steps.instructions: Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch, and lemon juice

steps.descr: Roll out half the pastry and line a pie dish

on_enter.say: Let's roll out half of our chilled pastry and carefully line the pie dish. This will be the base for our scrumptious filling.

steps.instructions: Roll out half the pastry and line a pie dish

on_enter.say: Now, let's fill our pie base with that lovely apple mixture. Make sure it's evenly spread out for a perfect bake.

steps.descr: Cover with remaining pastry, seal edges

on_enter.say: Let's cover our pie with the remaining pastry. Press down the edges to seal it nicely, so all those lovely juices stay inside.

steps.instructions: Cover with remaining pastry, seal edges

steps.descr: Brush with beaten egg, make slits for steam

on_enter.say: Let's brush the top with a beaten egg for that golden finish, and don't forget to make a few slits to let the steam escape.

steps.instructions: Brush with beaten egg, make slits for steam

steps.descr: Bake 45 minutes until golden, cool before serving

on_enter.say: Time to pop our pie in the oven. We'll bake it for forty-five minutes until it's beautifully golden. Once done, let it cool a bit before serving. Enjoy the wonderful aroma filling your kitchen!

steps.instructions: Bake 45 minutes until golden, cool before serving

recipe.title: Classic Apple Pie
recipe.description: Traditional American dessert with flaky crust and cinnamon apples
